item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.mysterious_me: Debug Random Moonlit Broker Spawn Egg
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.moon_glow_kat: Night moonlight attacks may apply Moon Trace
Consume mark for bonus physical + delayed magic damage
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.moon_glow_: Under moonlight, each strike leaves a pale promise
Marked foes are answered by a quieter second wound
30% chance to cut 30% current HP (target HP > 10)
Cannot deliver the final blow (keeps target at >=1 HP)
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.regret_bla: The wound remembers what the mind cannot bear
It trims fate, not the final breath
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.eclipse_blade: 40% chance to inflict Eclipse mark (2.5s trigger CD per target)
Mark applies 2 random debuffs (including Poison); boss duration is halved
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.eclipse_bl: Dark light settles on the target like a hush
Curses bloom where the mark remains
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.oblivion_edge: Causality Reversal: When low HP, equalize enemy HP
Marked targets: penetration bonus damage (35%, boss 17.5%)
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.oblivion_e: It reads fear, then edits destiny
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.nmap_katana.m: Host Discovery: warning scan -> Resistance V (2s, max chain 3)
Vuln Scan: +50% crit bonus vs armor=0 (3s CD)
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.nmap_katan: Threat = targeting you; fallback: <=12, visible, moving toward you
On threat: Resistance V for 2s. Max 3 refreshes
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.sentinel_helm: When the dark moves, the watch bell answers.
[Echo Pulse] In darkness, detect nearby hostiles and gain Speed I for 1.5s with an alert chime. Range: 16 blocks. Cooldown: 40s
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.silent_oath_h: The first strike is forgiven—after that, you pay in full.
[Silent Oath] First hit from hostile mobs reduced by 2 damage. Cooldown: 30s
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.exile_mask_he: [Desperation] Below 50% HP: +1 attack per 7.5% HP lost (max +4). Updates every 1s
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.relic_circlet: Attention is a curse—this ring turns it into shelter.
[Guardian Aura] Gain Absorption I for 3s when first targeted by a mob. Cooldown: 30s
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.retracer_orna: [Second Chance] Survive lethal explosion damage once, set to 1 HP with Resistance V for 2s. Totem takes priority. Cooldown: 15min
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.old_market_ch: Old coins still ring true—if you know where to spend them.
[Market Wisdom] Trade XP: 50% chance ×1.5 (first trade per slot, CD 60s). Kill XP: 25% chance ×2 (CD 30s)
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.blood_pact_ch: Signed in blood—paid on the next strike.
[Blood Pact] 50% on hit: self-damage min(50% dmg, 2♥) stored (max 4♥). Next attack consumes pool as bonus damage. 10s window
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.ghost_god_che: Undead curses stop at the edge of this steel.
[Ghost Ward] Undead damage: 30% (Boss 15%) chance -15%. Undead debuffs (Wither/Hunger/Slowness): 50% (Boss 25%) immune
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.ghost_god_: Undead malice fades against this iron hush
Their curses falter at your chest
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.windbreaker_c: [Windbreaker] +30% knockback resistance. When HP drops from ≥50% to <50%: Speed I 5s (CD 90s, rearm at 60%)
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.windbreake: The wind cannot move a steady heart
When panic rises, your stride answers
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.void_devourer: Every five seconds, the void takes its bite.
[Void Bite] On attack: +4% true damage (Boss 2%). CD: 5s
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.smuggler_shin: A cutpurse's luck—measured, timed, and never free.
[Loot Bonus] On kill: 20% extra loot roll + 10% double drop (Boss: 10%/5%). CD: 40s. No PVP
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.smuggler_pouc: Nothing vanishes—everything simply finds its way home.
[Magnet] Auto-pull items within 6 blocks for 5s. CD: 35s. Items only (no XP orbs)
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.graze_guard_l: A step aside—paid for in scars you never received.
[Graze] 18% chance: reduce damage by 60%. CD: 12s. Living attackers only
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.stealth_shin_: The street remembers every fall—and teaches you which ones to ignore.
[Fall Pad] Charge 1 layer per 45s (max 2). Fall >=1.5HP: consume 1 layer, reduce 80%
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.clear_ledger_: Every settled debt lightens the stride.
[Speed Stride] Kill: Speed I 3s. Kill during CD: +1s (max 6s). CD: 16s. No PVP
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.untraceable_t: Where you walk, no trail remains.
[Vanish] 12s out of combat: Invisibility 3s (no particles). CD: 45s
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.untraceabl: When battle forgets you, so does the world
Your outline fades between two heartbeats
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.boundary_walk: [Boundary Leap] Overworld outdoor + rain/thunder/snow/night: Jump Boost I. Refreshes while conditions met
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.boundary_w: Under open sky, weather becomes a stairway
You step where others only jump
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.ghost_step_bo: The living pass through you like wind.
[Phantom] Out of combat: entities cannot push you. In combat: push returns. Hit 2x in 1s: 1s emergency no-push (CD 15s)
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.ghost_step: Crowds pass through you like mist
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.marching_boot: Steady pace, steady mind—until the blade falls.
[March] 8s no attack + 4s no damage: Speed II (max 15s). Attack to cancel + 12s CD
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.marching_b: Calm steps gather speed like a marching drum
Strike too soon, and the rhythm shatters
item.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.gossamer_boot: Silk cannot bind what silk has made.
[Web Walk] In cobweb: 70% less slowdown. Slowness II downgraded to I. Effect fades on exit
tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.gossamer_b: Webs lose their claim on your ankles

tooltip.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.fatalis.li: Each hit sounds like a final answer

guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.1:
1) Core loop (remember this)

Combat/explore -> loot resources -> return to village broker -> get stronger -> explore deeper.

Stable currency: Silver Notes.
Progress tasks: Bounty Contracts.
Key operations: Trade Scrolls.
Rare high-tier resource: Mysterious Coins.

Treat the village as your base.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.2:
2) How the broker appears

The broker only attempts to appear near villages.
Before first encounter: Bootstrap stage, with more aggressive spawn attempts.
After first unlock: Normal stage, stable recurring visits.

Rain only boosts chance. It is not a hard gate.
Progress is still possible in clear weather.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.3:
3) Merchant Mark

Your first interaction with the broker triggers first-unlock:
you receive the guide and a bound Merchant Mark.

Progress is protected by unlock state,
not by whether the mark is currently in your inventory.

If unlocked and no mark exists in your inventory, one reissue can trigger.
After that, replacements must be bought via trade.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.4:
4) Mark summon ritual (village bell)

Hold your bound Merchant Mark and right-click a village bell.

Summon gates:
- Personal cooldown
- World active lock (one broker per dimension at a time)
- Pending request dedupe (cannot queue duplicates)

Summon does not require rain.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.5:
5) Trade-side economy valves

Keeping a broker around (lead/boat/minecart/name tag)
does not create infinite output.

The real limits are trade-side:
- Each trade has maxUses
- Refresh requires Trade Scroll consumption
- Relic katana routes are gated by ownership + secretSold checks

Economy balance lives in trade valves, not broker lifetime.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.6:
6) Send-off flow (multiplayer-friendly)

Sneak + right-click broker with a Trade Scroll to arm send-off.
Repeat within 3 seconds to confirm: consume 1 scroll and dismiss broker.
(Creative mode skips cost but still advances cooldown logic.)

Send-off runs existing despawn + cleanup, releases active lock,
and advances global cooldown to prevent infinite rerolling.

Use it to rotate variant/shelf rhythm after finishing trades.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.7:
7) Bounty system

Contracts come from target mob pools, with actionbar + sound on drop.
Kill progress supports main-hand and off-hand paths.
Milestone hints appear at 25% / 50% / 75%; 100% marks submission-ready.

Target ranges (current):
Normal: 10-25 (triangular mode near 17)
Elite: 5-15 (mode near 10)
Rare-elite density caps reduce extreme outliers.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.8:
8) Combat and exploration rewards

Silver Notes: primary combat currency, with elite drop multipliers.
Mysterious Coins: rare high-tier resource.
Sources include high-tier structure chests and bounty coin rolls.

First completed bounty guarantees 1 coin to bootstrap progression.

Coin minting through normal trade flow is blocked
by release safeguards to prevent economy collapse.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.9:
9) New player route

1. Set up in a village (bed/storage/supplies).
2. Mine/explore and stock Silver Notes + Trade Scrolls.
3. Meet broker, complete first unlock, get your Mark.
4. Convert notes into gear to raise combat stability.
5. Run bounties for scrolls/coins and clear progression goals.
6. Loot structures for higher-tier coin inflow.
7. Use send-off scroll flow when you want a new trade rhythm.
guide.xqanzd_moonlit_broker.page.10:
10) Keep these 4 rules

1. Unlock state protects progression; losing Mark does not hard-lock you.
2. Economy valves are trade-side: maxUses / refresh scroll / ownership state.
3. Combat and exploration both pay off: notes/contracts from combat, coins from exploration.
4. Multiplayer stays controllable: one broker serves all, send-off handles pacing.
